title: Block cipher mode of operation
summary: A block cipher mode of operation, usually just called a "mode" in context, specifies how a block cipher should be used to encrypt or decrypt messages that are longer than the block size.

parents.title: MDN Web Docs Glossary: Definitions of Web-related terms
